creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: old sepia-toned photographic image of two men dressed as cowboys with guns pointed crouching behind boxes in front of a painted backdrop of a log cabin and mountains; "LET FREEDOM RING" in brown at bottom with sketches of Native American people seen from back wearing blankets in a row beneath text; metal stars at left and right sides of text
medium: Archival digital print, colored pencil, and metal stars
object_name: Print with drawing and collaged elements
signed: LRC on back, in pencil: © Tom Jones 2002
title: Dear America: Let Freedom Ring
